Dr. Jeevun Sandher
Member of Parliament for Loughborough, Shepshed and the Villages
Thank you to the people of Loughborough, Shepshed, and the Villages for electing me to serve as your Member of Parliament.
If you need to get in touch, please remember to include your name and full postal address. If you’ve contacted me for help or advice, thank you for your patience – I will reply to you soon.
